```{r datain}
library(printr)
df <- read.csv("../runningRecords2016.csv")
```

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
summary(df)
table(df$weather)
sum(grepl(x=df$startTime, pattern = "am"))
sum(grepl(x=df$startTime, pattern = "pm"))
plot(x=df$date,grepl(x=df$startTime, pattern = "am"))
```
